Sources: Seychelles authorities; and IMF staff estimates and projections.
The fiscal program targets at the approval of the EFF are now presented in percent of the new GDP. Data include the central government and the social security system.
Wage and salaries and goods and services (to be) spent by government agencies other than Ministries are reclassified into these items from transfers.
Only interest payments on foreign debt are on a commitment basis. Other expenditures are recorded when checks are issued or transfers initiated.
Includes debt issued by the Ministry of Finance for monetary purposes, excludes guarantees.
